mapper.select: select coll.collection_id as coll_collection_id, coll.user_id as coll_user_id, coll.goods_id as coll_goods_id, coll.add_time as coll_add_time, coll.update_time as coll_update_time, coll.deleted as coll_deleted, goods.* from mall_collection coll left join mall_goods goods on coll.goods_id = goods.goods_id where coll.deleted != 1 and goods.deleted != 1 and coll.user_id = #{userId}
